text: David A. Zeller (June 8, 1939 - September 3, 2020) was an American professional basketball player. He played college basketball for the Miami RedHawks. He played in the National Basketball Association for the Cincinnati Royals between 1961 to 1962. Zeller was born in New Carlisle, Ohio. Zeller died on September 3, 2020 in Toledo, Ohio at the age of 81.The ‘Shooter’…Former Piqua Coach Dave Zeller Dies ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:Sportspeople from Ohio
title: Dave Zeller
